updates.title: Updated Kingdom Rush Alliance Roadmap
updates.content: {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/44971628/032eb7fbeb44bac5b1d0761a0fc5166e38472917.png January: DLC Exclusive Campaign - What better resolution is there for New Year than playing more Kingdom Rush Alliance? The exclusive Campaign will feature five new stages, one hero, and one powerful tower to start your year with a bang. To Be Determined: FREE Mini Campaign - Epic New Mini Campaign, with 3 stages, 1 new hero, and 1 new tower! https://store.steampowered.com/app/2849080/Kingdom_Rush_5_Alliance_TD/ Plus even more content to come â€”weâ€™ll keep you posted!

updates.title: Abominor Mechanics Update
updates.content: {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/44971628/b994b6107fff322d15fbcf7007ee422f86a339e7.jpg Weâ€™ve heard your feedback loud and clear, and weâ€™re excited to share some changes we made to Abominor. Many of you raised concerns about its tower-destroying mechanic, and weâ€™ve reworked it to make the encounter more balanced and rewarding. What's New? Abominor will no longer outright destroy towers. Instead, towers will now be reduced to rubble. Youâ€™ll have the option to repair these ruins, restoring your tower back to actionâ€”for a cost. This change keeps the tension high without feeling overly punishing. Additionally,Â Abominorâ€™s stats have been adjusted to ensure a fair but challenging experience. Abominor's adjustments: Speed (across phases): Old: 22/19/14/10/7 New: 24/21/17/14/12 Restore HP on Phase Up: Old: 1700/2200/1700/2200 New: 1700/2200/1700/4000 Tower Eating Cooldown: Old: 12/12/18/18/20 New: 12/12/16/16/18 Thank you for your feedback and for helping us improve the game with every update. Try it out and...

updates.title: Bug Fixes Changelog
updates.content: {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/44971628/2b0bf39f89f2a40f6032ca291868a75f7f14e243.png Hello Generals! we wanted to let you know that we have several bug fixes. Changelog: Fixed Rocket Gunners Missile crash Fixed Dante and Demon Pit's damage types Fixed several chinese localization texts Balanced SFXs on stage 24 We are still working on fixing the timing of the opening of the foot in stage 1, and some further rebalancing of the dlc. If you still experience any issues, please comment in this discussion as we will be taking a close look at the comments. Thank you so much for your patience and helping us improve the game! https://store.steampowered.com/app/3368630/Kingdom_Rush_5_Alliance_TD__Colossal_Dwarfare_Campaign/

updates.title: Balance Patch: Buffs to Towers, Heroes, and Enemies
updates.content: {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/44971628/42cd51c27270295e13036f570743a30968692584.png Hello Generals! As promised, we are making a big set of balance changes to Kingdom Rush Alliance. Youâ€™ll notice weâ€™ve buffed up the weaker towers and heroes, while some Colossal Dwarfare enemies have been strengthened mostly on Impossible difficulty. Full changelog: Towers Dwarven Flamespitter: Can now target flying enemies Brewmasters: Halfdan attack speed buffed 1.5 sec -> 1 sec Necromancer: Basic skeleton now has 50 HP (from 40) and 3-5 damage (from 1-4). Golem has 150 HP (from 120) and 8-12 dmg (from 6-10). Cooldown for Rattling Beacon was reduced in levels 1 and 2 Elven Stargazer: fixed attack rate change bug between some upgrades, Reload Damage increased from 4-6/10-16/20-28/32-48 to 4-6/11-18/22-32/34-52 Event Horizon Cost decreased from 250/150/150 to 250/100/100 Rising Star Damage increased from 16-24/28-42/36-54 to 18-30/28-42/36-54 Rising Star Range increased from 120 to 200 Rising Star Stun increased f...

2024-12-03_Ancient Hunger Relea.title: Ancient Hunger Release Day Stream with the devs!
positive_examples: è¿˜æŒºå–œæ¬¢è¿™éƒ¨çš„ å¾ˆå¥½çŽ© åŒè‹±é›„è¿˜æŒºå¥½çš„ è‹±é›„å‰æœŸå°æ ‘çµæ˜¯æœ€å¥½ç”¨çš„ å†åŠ ä¸€ä¸ªå®šç‚¹ç«™ä½çš„è‹±é›„ ä½†åŽæœŸé‚£è‚¯å®šå°±æ˜¯ä¸¤æ¡é¾™äº† æ­»çµæ³•å¸ˆå¡”æ˜¯çœŸçš„å…¨èƒ½ ä¼¤å®³é˜²ç©ºæ‹¦æˆªåŠ ä¸€æ¡è·¯çš„ä¼¤å®³ ç›®å‰æµç¨‹å¤ªçŸ­äº† å®Œå…¨ä¸å¤ŸçŽ© è¶…çº§æœŸå¾…åŽç»­å†…å®¹ é“çš®æ”¶åˆ°ç«é€Ÿæ›´æ–°ï¼
negative_examples:
Para ser la quinta entrega de una aclamada saga de tower defence, debo de admitir que tiene mecanicas revolucionarias que podrian considerarla uno de los mejores Kingdom Rush. Tener dos heroes en batalla, y cinco torres de alguna de las dos facciones es una excelente tematica y forma de introducir nuevas formas de juego, donde puedes hacer una mezcla de ambos bandos o alinearte mas para uno, Los niveles y enemigos estan muy bien ambientados y hechos, e incluso la pelea de el jefe final es extremadamente buena y original. Las torres y heroes son una combinacion de nuevos personajes con algunos de antiguas entregas, e incluso expandiendo sus futuros luego de sus respectivos tiempos.
Recomiendo mucho este juego de Kingdom Rush, tiene una buena dinamica muy original y abierta para todos, donde incluso podemos elegir un bando que mas nos agrade.

As far as I'm concerned, the part is unfinished, but it's being saved by new mini-campaigns, I haven't played the DLC yet, but I've passed the game for 70/70 achievements (not counting the new dlc), and tomorrow I'll buy a dlc and see if it spoils my impression.

So not worth the money for many of the reasons already stated. Beautiful artwork, some new towers, pretty cool. But sort of a rework of KR2. Here, they artificially increase the difficulty by adding a great many "dual path" scenarios. Their last couple games had some, and it was ok, but this game seems to depend on dual path to increase difficulty instead of using ingenuity.
